SEARCH
Package fhtw.chat

Class PrivateChat

java.lang.Object
fhtw.chat.Chat
fhtw.chat.PrivateChat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PrivateChat extends Chat implements Serializable
Represents a private chat between two users in the chat application.

This class encapsulates the details of a private chat, including the members, the chat messages, and the online status. It provides methods to manage the chat messages, convert chat data to JSON, and manage online status.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PrivateChat

      public PrivateChat(String firstMember, String secondMember)
      Constructs a new PrivateChat with the specified members. Initializes the list of chat messages and appends the gender of each member to their username.
      Parameters:
      firstMember - the username of the first member of the chat
      secondMember - the username of the second member of the chat

    • PrivateChat

      public PrivateChat()
      Default constructor. Used primarily for JSON deserialization.

  • Method Details

    • convertSetToJson

      public static String convertSetToJson(List<PrivateChat> privateChats) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Converts a list of PrivateChat objects to its JSON representation.
      Parameters:
      privateChats - the list of PrivateChat objects
      Returns:
      a JSON string representing the list of private chats
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there is an error in writing the JSON string

    • addMsg

      public void addMsg(PrivateChatMessage message)
      Adds a message to this private chat.
      Parameters:
      message - the PrivateChatMessage to be added to the chat

    • setOnlineForList

      public static void setOnlineForList(List<PrivateChat> list)
      Sets the online status for a list of private chats based on the online status of their members.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of PrivateChat objects whose online status needs to be updated

    • addUser

      public static boolean addUser(String sender, String receiver)
      Adds a user to the private chat between the sender and receiver. Creates a new private chat if one does not already exist between the two users.
      Parameters:
      sender - the username of the sender
      receiver - the username of the receiver
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully added or the chat is successfully created, false otherwise

    • sendMessage

      public static boolean sendMessage(PrivateChatMessage message)
      Sends a message in a private chat.
      Parameters:
      message - the PrivateChatMessage to be sent
      Returns:
      true if the message is successfully sent, false otherwise
